tweets.text:
Organisations across Greater Manchester have planted 150,000 trees in the past year‚Ä¶ üëè

‚Ä¶ and that‚Äôs not all we‚Äôre doing! Find out about our plans for nature and our plans for the future.
https://t.co/7LP6PGkXM0
#GMGreenCity https://t.co/MwslNdSTWl

Letters have gone out to 1200 landowners warning them they face heavy fines for polluting Herefordshire‚Äôs rivers. @EnvAgencyMids say they‚Äôre working with farmers to prevent run off into rivers like the #Wye & #Lugg https://t.co/JNSVvZferZ

Our environment projects help to create homes for some of England‚Äôs shyest creatures. Read about how we're working with @NaturalEngland, @WildlifeTrusts and @EnvAgency to do more, together. 

https://t.co/kMCyyLgSAC https://t.co/QyugqV8JDu

urls.title: Highways England Designated Funds
urls.description: As custodian of the country‚Äôs motorways and major A-roads, we know that the work we do makes a positive difference ‚Äì for people, the economy and the planet. From 2020 to 2025, we‚Äôll be investing ¬£936 million from our standalone ‚Äì or designated ‚Äì funding. This money is allocated to four funding streams focused on making improvements that will make the biggest difference and deliver lasting benefits. We play a vital role in peoples‚Äô lives. 95 billion journeys take place on our roads every year, carrying a

tweets.text: The #CulmGrassland at DWT Stapleton Mire is looking spectacular‚Äìso many scabious in flower, supporting huge numbers of invertebrates including bumbles, hoverflies, spiders, flies, moths, and butterflies‚Ä¶.  #ActionForInsects @Interreg2Seas @DevonCC @EnvAgency https://t.co/30BqbIQLwY

‚ö°In an effort to reduce city's #AirPollution, @TelAviv, together with ElectReon & Dan Bus Company launched a pilot project to install wireless electric roads, enabling travel for specially-equipped electric buses, capable of being charged from under-road electric infrastructure. https://t.co/b24WTEtP6a

Crews along with @EnvAgency & @DurhamCouncil have made good progress extinguishing the waste outside of the buildings at Eldon. Now with help from the site owner, they're working on separating & extinguishing waste from inside the building.  Thanks for your patience & support. https://t.co/zicUGQd4yJ

We're excited to share latest pic of new river channel @StaffsUni. This project will create a more dynamic and diverse river habitat  for a wider range of wild species, such as brown trout, otters & kingfishers. @EnvAgencyMids @StaffsUnion @WildTroutTrust @Sotlive @BBCRadioStoke https://t.co/9m2H2PsiHP

The saltmarsh of The Wash got a health check last week as we conducted Condition Assessment work for three new areas working with the Environmental Agency and MOD. We found some beautiful saltmarsh species such as sea wormwood and sea aster mining bee. @mod_dio @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/jkdqh2t4OS
Virtually no water this part of  the upper Ivel today. Certainly no flow. This is not sustainable. No heron seen for weeks as no longer any fish.  It‚Äôs tragic https://t.co/3FR0CsQMg7

tweets.text:
We have had a fantastic first day at this year's virtual #GMGreenSummit2020! 

It is vital that nature is at the heart of Greater Manchester's sustainable future and we can all take action to improve our #environment today, tomorrow and together. #GMGreenCity https://t.co/ov3DFx0BgR

We've completed the installation of 'property flood resilience' (PFR) products at the first house that opted in as part of the York Flood Alleviation Scheme. It's the first installation of 54 properties in the New Walk 'flood cell'.  Eligible properties can get PFR up to ¬£7,500. https://t.co/t87VKd9dgQ

Collected 115 bags of rubbish plus 25 tyres plus a toilet and assorted items this morning on the Bottesford Beck in Scunthorpe! Well done to the Friends of Bottesford Beck @KeepBritainTidy @stwater @EnvAgencyMids #GBSeptemberClean https://t.co/8PAoaQQBlf

We are still onsite supporting the fire service @CDDFRS who have dramatically reduced the burning waste pile at Eldon, Bishop Auckland. Our officers have minimised impact on the local environment, by storing and recycling fire water run off which could have polluted the Dene Beck https://t.co/8duSlrltuE
https://t.co/QZ7lsFRwgF

Wow - a  converted vending sweet machine with seed bombs in areas around colleges and community gardens in America - what a great idea @GdnMediaGuild #seedbombs #seeds @EnvAgency @BSBIbotany #gardening #flowers @NatGeo  #nature #wildflowerhour #botany https://t.co/Ld2ps9WP68
